page.title: 08SW EDGE OF CHELTENHAM
page.content: This area is bounded by one main{"A" {road}with dual carriage-ways and is a busy link road. The southern boundary is the A40 - the main road between Cheltenham and Gloucester - very busy particularly during the rush hours, it has an entry on to the{M5 motorway. The western boundary is Princess Elizabeth Way - a ring road round Cheltenham leading to Tewkesbury, or Evesham in the North. This area is mainly{residential}consisting of many blocks of flats served by ten small shops and a small shopping complex including national supermarkets. Area well served with social amenities- a library,youth centres and a C of E church.{Light engineering}firm, branch of one of largest in the country, makes pumps and valves that use steam,water or compressed air and export world wide.
